executiveSummary: Jared Steele, founder of Terishroom from Austin, Texas, pitched his fully automated mushroom-growing device seeking $175,000 for 2.5% equity. Despite enthusiasm for the product design, the Sharks declined to invest due to unshipped pre-orders, overengineering concerns, and a high $7 million valuation.
nextSteps: Jared will proceed with production and aim to deliver the first 1,140 Terishroom units to the Austin warehouse by July before shipping to customers.
